character_name: Malcolm X (previously Malcolm Little). The protagonist and titular character
Betty Shabazz. A nurse and NOI activist who later marries Malcolm. The real Betty Shabazz served as an advisor to the production.
Elijah Muhammad. The charismatic leader of the Nation of Islam.
West Indian Archie. A Harlem gangster and who runs a local numbers game and takes a young Malcolm under his wing.
Shorty. Malcolm's close friend from childhood who follows him into crime
Laura. A young woman whom Malcolm had a strained romantic relationship with
Sophia. A young white woman whom Malcolm meets at a Boston nightclub and who quickly becomes his lover and partner-in-crime. She is caught alongside him for their crimes
the host of a talk show who interviews Malcolm.
a member of the Black Legion who attacks the Little family.
an elderly woman who encourages Malcolm before his final speech.
